chain_id.description: ChainID string, the number prefix determines the actual base

data.description: Data hex encode string, include prefix string "0x"

gas_price.description: GasPrice string, the number prefix determines the actual base

value.description: Value string, the number prefix determines the actual base

action.description: ACTION have 2 states: "ADD" means Producer is normal, "REMOVE" means Producer has announced to leave the group by itself
